transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha ji
Executive: Rahul ji free hue hai?
Customer: Ha free to sir dekho kam ka koi phone aata to
Executive: Sir dekho nahi dekho sir actually maine aapko dikhaya na ki matlab ki bahut sare logo ke sath leads aati hai, thik hai? Aap waha mujhe ek cheez batao apna jo leads hai thik hai aap shop pe pure din baithte hai ki nahi baithte hai?
Customer: 
Executive: Ya kahi jana hota field work to apne offline jo business hote pura time dete hai na?
Customer: Ha ha
Executive: To online me to sir din me kam se kam ek do ghante de sakte ho na?
Customer: 
Executive: Kyunki sir dekho main aapki activity dekhi aap do-do hafte baad IndiaMART pe aa rahe ho ek ek bar consume kar rahe ho do-do hafte baad to batao sir apne offline business pe aap jate do hafte baad ek din jate 10 minute shop pe rehte fir chale jate ghar pe fir do hafte baad jate waha pe aapko business milta?
Customer: Waisa hi baat hai
Executive: Same sir to same sir yahi pe sir aapko thoda daily active hona padega
Executive: And main agar aapko batau
Executive: Ek minute sir ye jo Fateh Enviro Engineers Private Limited hai aap inke sath area ke hai na, Buldhana ke hai na?
Customer: Ha
Executive: Inse puchiye sir ye bhi proper active kar lete hai proper
Executive: Thik hai inka maine abhi dekha thik hai ye proper din me matlab ki inke about 20 bar open karke dekhte hai IndiaMART ko
Customer: Hmm
Executive: To sir aap bhi dekho yaha pe dekhoge to fir proper milega unko business kaha se mil raha hai sir kaha se mil raha hai unko bhi?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Unko bhi business kaha mil raha hai IndiaMART pe?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir maine dekha abhi unka dekho proper wo active rehte hai sir
Customer: Sir active rehna alag cheez hai business milna alag cheez hai sir meri baat suno
Executive: Sir dekho dekho ab sir wo aapko bataye nahi but unka jo account manager hai thik hai abhi just main baat karke aaya hu thik hai to proper dekho sir yaha pe unka bhi dekha maine activity dekh ke dekha to active hai and baat bhi kar rahe hai thik hai and aap ye bataiye sir jo aapke direct call aa rahi hai thik hai usse kya baat hoti hai?
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Jaise main dekh pa raha hu aapko bhi direct call aati hai beech month me teen call aayi thi teen me se apne do receive kiya tha
Customer: Hmm
Executive: To call pe kya baat hui thi? Favorable leads nahi aa rahe sir koi na koi koi na koi mera koi business hai wo ETP hai ha ETP hai aur calls kis cheez ki aa rahi hai?
Customer: Pata nahi kya hi cheez ki aati hai pata nahi koi bol raha hai floor machine koi kya koi kya pata nahi kya hi kya hai
Executive: Waisa to nahi hona chahiye kyunki dekho sir aapne dono call receive kiya hai kuch to matlab pata hoga na ki ab yaad
Customer: [inaudible] rehta hai sir
Executive: Accha ishi month me aayi hai to isiliye maine socha ki kya pata aapko yaad ho aur dekho sir balish ke liye na thoda sa aapko active hona padega yaha pe abhi maine aapko dekhiye 1000 LLP ki send kiya ki nahi? Aapne usse baat kiya?
Customer: Kisse?
Executive: Jo maine aapko send kiya whatsapp pe leads 1000 LLP ki
Customer: Hmm
Executive: To aapne usse baat kiya?
Customer: Baat kya karu dusra koi koi phone kya phone aa raha hai
Executive: Sir baat karoge dekho sir isiliye maine dekho maine dikhaya 10-10 minute ki leads yaha pe sold out ho ja rahi hai
Executive: To contact karke 10-10 minute ki leads aati hai turant sold out ho ja rahi hai
Customer: Hmm hmm
Executive: Kyunki Jaipur me aapke Rajasthan me kafi log yaha pe hai thik hai same aapki jo product line hai same me to contact by now click karke aadhe ghante baad baat kar lijiye
Executive: But baat to karenge tabhi to sir hoga na agar aap baat hi nahi karoge to fir wo chances hi nahi rahenge agar baat karenge to matlab 2% 10% chance to banega ki ha in fact aapne baat kiya fir bhi aapko nahi mila to wo alag baat hoti hai but agar aap use bhi nahi kar rahe ho to fir aap bol rahe ho nahi to wo alag baat hai
Executive: Thik hai sir chalo chalo ha aap mujhe bhejte raha karo aise aa nahi jati nahi hai aane ke liye to dekho sir dekho kya baat hai dekho agar aap waha pe 10 bar 20 bar active rahoge na to hame lagega ha sir ko nahi mile to hum bhi ek bar try karenge ha sir ko main khud se bhejta hu but aap sir do-do hafte baad aa rahe ho to waha bhi samajh rahe hai aap?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm
Executive: Ha ha aur iske alawa aur bataiye kya consult aapko aa rahi hai ya iske alawa ye problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Are sir baki kya mujhe koi relation thodi karne hai waha pe mujhe business do to kam ho jayega dekho sir iske liye main dekhiye sir iske liye main aapko bata raha hu ki sir din me aapko 10 bar kam se kam isko open karke dekhna hoga leads aa rahi hai ki nahi aa rahi kyunki har minute main bhi dekh raha hu
Customer: Baki walo ko kya taklif hoga mujhe baki kya taklif hoga batao IndiaMART se kya aur to aur jaise matlab calls bhi sahi nahi aa rahi hai thik hai thik hai aur dekho balish ke liye ek hi chance hai thik hai ki aapko proper yaha pe active hona padega samajh rahe hai?
Customer: Hmm thik hai sir thik hai
Executive: Yaha pe active hoke usse baat karna rahe
Executive: To sir ye aapka consult main close kar du taki aap proper active rahe? Hai?
Executive: Aapka ek consult close kar du ki ha matlab ki leads nahi aa rahi hai kyunki dekho sir maine aapko dikhaya leads to aa rahi hai
Customer: Thik hai sir ab main to meri baat suniye sir baat to sun lijiye
Executive: Accha baat kya hai mere paas ha to to main aapka concern close kar du?
Customer: Concern aise close karne se kya hoga sir kam aaye tab aana koi business mila ho koi kam mila ho to sir dekho to iske liye aap ek se do din matlab proper active hoke dekh lijiye
Customer: Ha thik hai thik hai thik hai ha and sir mere liye bhi aapke paas ek feedback jayega thik hai ki aap humse matlab jo maine aapko solution diya hai ki maine aapko jo balish send kiya hai matlab sahi send kiya hai thik hai to waha pe hoga satisfied mark hoga not satisfied bhi hoga thik hai dekh lijiyega thik hai and aap proper do din active hoke proper dekhiye thik hai thik thik dekhta hu thik
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting favorable leads.

- Customer is not getting relevant business calls.

- Customer wants business to be generated.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of being active.

- Executive shared example of active user.

- Executive offered to close the consult.

- Executive asked to be active for 2 days.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will be active for 2 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, business, active, calls
